Title: Establishes the presence of a controlled substance in a certain room is presumptive evidence of knowing possession thereof by each person present in such room
Summary: Establishes the presence of a controlled substance in open view in a room, other than a public place, under certain circumstances is presumptive evidence of knowing possession thereof by each and every person present in such room in close proximity to such controlled substance at the time such controlled substance was found.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to a presumption of criminal possession of a controlled substance
